H3.text: In what year did Kurt Waldheim become UN General Secretary; Bloody Sunday happened in Derry, NI; President Nixon visited China.. 1972

A4.text: As secretary-general from 1972 onward, Waldheim opened and addressed a number of major international conferences convened under United Nations auspices.

A5.text: Waldheim was the secretary-general of the United Nations from 1972 to 1981
